channel.title: Together we can overcome life’s hardships - surf
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/surfmusicinc/together-we-can-overcome-lifes-hardships
send this around, i’m trying to get a positive message heard both around the auxy community and outside of the community. let me know what you think about it

item.title: Together we can overcome life’s hardships - surf
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
So, had a play with it this morning and threw on some retro layers to give it a bit of a Summer Jam vibe.
Thrown together, so quite rough, but just a bit of fun.

Untitled (A Summer Jam)
Private link

item.title: Together we can overcome life’s hardships - surf
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Cool.

I can use the Ableton project, if you’re willing to share that. (I have 9 Suite.)
(Be sure to ‘File > Collect All and Save’ to gather all the bits together. Zip that up and share a download link with me.)

Otherwise, just the flattened WAV should be fine for me to try things out with.

Thanks again.

Read full topic

item.source: Together we can overcome life’s hardships - surf

item.title: Together we can overcome life’s hardships - surf
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Love it.
One of the best attempts at lo-fi hip-hop in Auxy I’ve heard.
Definitely captured a more authentic vibe than most.

Inspired me to load up some vintage sounds and try out some lead melodies.

 
Would you be up for sharing the WAV with me to try a couple of remix ideas?
(or the project + samples)

Read full topic
